metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8915 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
bsdcpio in libarchive before 3.2.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid read and crash) via crafted cpio file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8915` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.1
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.1
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.1').
